title: Lunchbox RETURNS from His Diamond Mining Trip…Did He Find Anything? + Our New Punishment for Ruining TV Shows / Movies + Amy’s Odd Endorsement Request That’s She’s Questioning
itunes:title: Lunchbox RETURNS from His Diamond Mining Trip…Did He Find Anything? + Our New Punishment for Ruining TV Shows / Movies + Amy’s Odd Endorsement Request That’s She’s Questioning
description:
Lunchbox returns from his diamond mining trip to Arkansas. He brings back a paper sack and reveals what he found. We came up with our new rule for spoiling TV shows / movies after someone else is accused of spoiling a show. Amy got a request to endorse a product that turns ashes into jewelry and questions whether or not she should do it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
